content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-10.0, -50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-10.5, -48.5) connected to the Stone Furnace
- Wooden Chest at position (-8.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-7.5, -49.5) connected to the Wooden Chest
- Burner Inserter at position (-5.5, -49.5)

### Belt Network
Consists of the following belt groups:
- BeltGroup connecting from position (-15.5, -54.5) to (-13.5, -54.5)
- BeltGroup connecting from position (-21.5, -51.5) to (-19.5, -51.5)
- BeltGroup connecting from position (-17.5, -50.5) to (-17.5, -52.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting belts directly to non-belt entities
- Ensure that belts are connected to other belts or use inserters to interface with entities like Stone Furnaces and Wooden Chests.

### NameError due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before use. Check for typos or missing declarations, especially when referencing objects like `drill_to_belt_inserter`.

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Before attempting to insert items, verify that the inventory contains the required items to avoid insertion errors.
